name: R5V20006ForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.Hl7VSReligion2 for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0006|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0006|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0006|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
